featured.text: The pilot project dedicated to developing the cactus biogas generator began in the south of Mexico City.
The cactus’s thick outer layer (i.e., husk), with all those spines, had always been viewed as a waste product until researchers developed a biogas generator to turn the husks into electricity.

definition.zh_def: 生物氣體是由有機物質在缺氧環境中分解而產生的可再生能源，主要成分是甲烷和二氧化碳。
definition.en_def: Biogas is a renewable energy source produced by the anaerobic decomposition of organic matter, primarily consisting of methane and carbon dioxide.
definition.example: Farmers can use biogas from manure to power their equipment.
